entry.title: Boy Wonder
entry.summary:
Author: Pluviolo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,726Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 45

Summary: “I feel like we’re all connected by this… this grave injustice we have to endure. This unfairness that haunts us throughout our lives.” Tim was lying down. His head was dizzy with the knowledge that he was going to ruin his life tomorrow. And how, despite that, it was doing nothing to squash the small hope growing inside of him as he watched the clock count down. Or Tim is trans. And an idiot.

entry.title: The way you save my heart.
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,182Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: Magic has rules. Some of them are… blurry. It saves the heart destined to love you—your name on their lips, and theirs echoing in every resonant beat of your heart. Soulmates bound by a power greater than themselves. Demanding and corrosive, magic forgot about human free will. And about how stupid humans could be. Jason didn’t think Robin was stupid.Which made the teenager an obvious threat. What the fuck was he trying to achieve by putting himself in danger just to force a soulmate bond with Jason?

entry.title: The Undo-Redo
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,496Chapters: 4/9Kudos: 34

Summary: Nightwing is hit by a spell that has takes about a decade off his age. This whole situation would be a footnote in a report if that were the only problem, but about a decade ago he didn’t know Jason, Tim or Damian. Dick had left the vigilant life behind so he wasn’t in contact with Bruce or anyone from their teams and communities. Oh and Bruce is off world with Clark and Diana so there is no help from that corner.His other little problem doesn’t appear in any aspect of this life he now lives and he is left to ask what happened?

entry.title: Never settle for someone that doesn't get you "just because" gifts (the disembodied heads of your enemies may apply)
entry.summary:
Author: Squids_Dumb

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,624Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 16

Summary: “Where you headed Hood, this isn't your territory, and since when are you out in daylight?”“I was gonna ask you guys the same thing, isn't this Signals time to be on the rooftops?”“Signal had an exam and Batgirl is supposed to be working a case with B tonight so I asked Robin if he wanted to tag along with me while I cover his shift.”“What are you doing akhi?”Nice of you to ask Damian, I’m trying to blow off some steam because the other half of your second set of parental figures has decided to run off, and even though he said he would be back, the more I think about him leaving, the less sure I am that he was telling the truth. “Just out for a stroll, thought I’d stop by Red Robin’s place and see how he's doing.” Stephanie nods, with a little hum,****Or, Slade has randomly decided to take off on Jason, even going as far as to cut his tracker off. He comes back with a suprise, and in the process Jason learns some new things about what Dick went through while he was gone.

entry.title: And That We Call Being
entry.summary:
Author: oldrockformations

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,111Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 399

Summary: “I’m Sorry?” If Tim's… friend (would Tim get shot if he were to call Jason his brother?) is feeling particularly gregarious, they might chat about light subjects—the latest trafficking ring Jason's brought down, the newest security measures government agencies have implemented to try and keep Tim out, whatever shenanigans their assorted siblings and sibling-adjacent friends are getting into. But they've always avoided any conversation topics that might be considered heavier. Namely: feelings. It's been a perfectly normal Tuesday morning so far. They haven't exchanged any words today, other than a dry greeting when Tim sat down half-an-hour ago. There's no way they're about to have this conversation right here, right now. "Do you ever think about being a woman?"   Or Jason comes to terms with the idea that he might be a woman, and realizes how loved she is in the process Or Orjesus christ can u imagine the sociopolitical impacts of the red hood coming out as trans

entry.title: Hate is a Bottomless Cup; I will Pour and Pour
entry.summary:
Author: gleamingmermaid

Summary: Tim Drake refuses to join Ra's Al Ghul. Ra's Al Ghul's obsession with Tim Drake takes a dark turn when Ra's captures him to make him sire his heir to succeed him as the Demon's Head. Meanwhile, his family bands together and will not leave any stone unturned until Tim is back with them safe and sound.

entry.title: Street claws
entry.summary:
Author: capitao_calcinha_de_mel

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,310Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 57

Summary: While Gotham continues its cycle of violence and vigilantes, Selina builds a silent legacy, teaching what the streets taught her too early: to fall, get back up, and never depend on anyone. Because some people aren't born heroes. They're born underdogs.And Gotham never notices when something dangerous is growing in the shadows.

entry.title: Restful Morning
entry.summary:
Author: SinsTatum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,464Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 119

Summary: The first thing that Tim became aware of as his eyes slowly opened out of a deep sleep was that he was pleasantly warm. His face pressed softly into the silk sheets of his bed and his mouth cracked open somewhere between a gasp and a yawn. "You're awake," a voice hums over his shoulder and a shift in the sheets draws his eyes from the sheets to twist over his shoulder to catch sight of the man settled behind him. Bruce looked beautiful. The early morning light slipping through their cracked curtains and his bare chest exposed to Tim letting his eyes trace down the firm muscles from his throat to his chest. He sucks in a slow breath eyes blinking and face falling back into the sheets as he feels the man shift behind him again. "Fuck—" he lets out a choked off sound his body tensing up and a heat rolling through his chest at the sudden realization about what actually woke him up.
